name: unssi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mpbi(wss(cun(c0, c1), c2), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wss(cun(c0, c1), c2)
-| wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2))
-| wb(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cun(c0, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cun(c0, c1), c2)
-| wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2))
-| wb(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cun(c0, c1), c2))

body.origin:
|- wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2))
-| wss(c0, c2)
-| wss(c1, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cun(c0, c1), c2)
-| wb(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cun(c0, c1), c2))
-| wss(c0, c2)
-| wss(c1, c2)

body.origin: |- wb(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cun(c0, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cun(c0, c1), c2)
-| wss(c0, c2)
-| wss(c1, c2)

comment: An inference showing the union of two subclasses is a subclass. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 10-Dec-2002.)
